evidence.text: The Commissioner is preliminarily enjoined from enforcing Virginia Code § 46.2-395 against Plaintiffs unless or until the Commissioner or another entity provides a hearing regarding license suspension and provides adequate notice thereof;

extracted.value: Preliminarily enjoined from enforcing Virginia Code § 46.2-395 against Plaintiffs without a hearing and adequate notice

evidence.text: The Commissioner shall remove any current suspensions of the Plaintiffs’ driver’s licenses imposed under Va. Code § 46.2-395;

extracted.value: Remove current suspensions of Plaintiffs' driver's licenses imposed under Va. Code § 46.2-395

evidence.text: The Commissioner is enjoined from charging a fee to reinstate Plaintiffs’ driver’s licenses if there are no other restrictions on their licenses.

extracted.value: Enjoined from charging reinstatement fees if no other license restrictions exist
